body:
- Adding sound mode `DOLBY PL2 GAME`
- Revert storing `sound_mode_raw` in upper case
- Prefer zone power status when it is available
- Avoid unnecassary validations of avr 2016 update method

- Adding sound mode `MULTI IN + DSUR`
- Normalize sound mode responses from receivers (convert to upper case, remove multiple spaces)
- Estimate sound mode in case response from receiver is not mapped yet

- Speed up setup process for some receivers
- Fix httpx tests

- Fix incorrect state when receiver is in STANDBY
- Improve determination of FriendlyName
- Round volume to 0.5 when setting it
- Adding sound modes DOLBY PL2 CINEMA and DTS-HD + DSUR
- Fix unsetting ALL_ZONE_STEREO
- Allow selecting input functions which appear as renamed sources only

- fix missing `friendly_name` on `AVR_X` receivers
- fix sound mode not setup correctly on `AVR_X` receivers
- don't stop on all errors in get device info query

- raise timeout exception only when ports 80 and 8080 time out
- catch httpx.RemoteProtoocolError exception

- replace `async_lru` by `asyncstdlib`
- fix issues with missing mainzone URL in zones
- don't raise AvrProcessingError when tonecontrol update fails

- Use getter function to include custom httpx.AsyncClients instead of instances
- Fix memory alru_cache memory leak on exceptions

- Not using context manager for httpx calls anymore
- Catching httpx.NetworkErrors on update
- Catch more exceptions on SCPD evaluation
- Fix compatibility of AsynClient setter with Home Assistant

- Support custom httpx.AsyncClient
- Improve identification of AVR X 2016 receivers
- Fix play-pause toggle 
- Fix soundmode setter in DenonAVR class
- Fix: `state` is always lower case now
Going async 🎉🥳

- Fix tone control update (which is broken in 0.9.9)
- Use AVR-X mode for receivers with CommApiVers 0220 and 0250
- Fix tests for Python 3.9

- Reduce number of API calls per update and avoid parallel calls. The interfaces of some receivers are quite shaky.
- Add sound mode DOLBY HD + DOLBY SURROUND

- Fix Audyssey update crashing when receiver does not return dynamiceq
- add MULTI IN + VIRTUAL:X sound mode
- fix typo in set_multieq method name
- Fix Audyssey update crashing when AppCommand0300.xml endpoint is not defined

- Add Audyssey settings
- Add sound mode "DTS + DOLBY SURROUND"
- Fix setting a AURO-3D sound mode
- Fix SOURCE input function on zone 2 and 3
- Automatically Add Internet Radio & AirPlay input functions if missing in input function list
- Increase read timeout for slow receivers

- Add bass, treble and tone control
- Add auro movie sound modes
- Reduce log level when receiver name is missing
- fix discovery of Denon DN-500AV

- Use the same logic for receiver names for avr-x-2016 devices as for any other device
- Add Marantz SR5013 & SR5014
- Add sound mode 'DOLBY PLII MOVIE'
- Parallelize SCPD XML requests to identify denon receivers

- Fix discovery for AVR-X1600H
- Replace ifaddr with more prevalent netifaces
- Discover same device only once
- Call receiver endpoints in parallel
- Fix switching states during update process
- Don't add unknown input functions to input function list

- Add device info such as serial_number
- Improved resilience when creating devices which are powered off
- Add sound mode 'DOLBY PL2 MUSIC'
- Update DEVICEINFO_COMMAPI_PATTERN to match latest firmware update for NR1609 and probably other AV receivers

- determining Spotify input source correctly on several AVR-X devices (e.g. Marantz SR5008)
- support AVC-X models (e.g. AVC-X8500H)
- support Marantz NR1710
- revert changes for Marantz NR1605, NR1606, NR1607, NR1608, NR1609 in version 0.7.12

- Add support Marantz NR1605, NR1606, NR1607, NR1608, NR1609
- Add some Dolby, DTS  and Music sound modes

- Publicly available play and pause methods
- Add support for Marantz SR70xx
- Bug fix for sound mode "All Zone stereo" being disabled automatically
- New sound modes

- Adding sound modes for "Denon AVR-X4500H"
- Adding sound mode 'MULTI IN + DOLBY SURROUND'
- Fix Source select FM / Tuner on Marantz NR1603
- Documentation of AppCommand0300.xml endpoint

- Fix empty sources list in Zone 2 and 3 at non AVR-X devices
- Add sound mode 'DOLBY HD'
- Add 'Dolby TrueHD' sound mode
- Add sound mode 'DOLBY ATMOS'

- Add sound modes 'DTS-HD MSTR', 'PURE DIRECT', 'PLIIX CINEMA', 'MCH STEREO'
- Add sound modes Denon AVR-X2500H

- Added AVR 2016 Sound Mode "All Zone Stereo"
- Marantz SR6011-6013 support
- Fix sound mode MULTI CH IN
- Added new sound modes

- Improved sound mode warning messages
  - Name of missing sound mode in log message 
  - No more log spams
- Added new sound modes
- Added support of testing sound mode availability
- Sync power state for HEOS models (2016+)
- Sound mode information only available in main zone

- Only publish image_url if accessible
- New source mapping entry for TUNER
- Cleanup of zone implementation
- Added sound mode support
- Bugfix: Update of input_func_list for non AVR-X devices always fails
- Basic support of post 2016 AVR-X receivers

- Add MANIFEST.in so that tests are included in source distributions
- Adding 'DENON' to SUPPORTED_MANUFACTURERS
- Don't repeat getting receiver name on each update
- Discovery now always returns a list
- Added support for Denon AVR-4810.

- Added configurable timeout for receiver HTTP requests
- Additional AVR-X detection based on CommApiVers
- Treat Marantz SR6007 - SR6010 as AVR-X device

- Marrantz SR5006 & SR5006 treated as AVR-X device
- Fixed Mapping of Media Player and AUX input functions

- On connection error device is treated as OFF
- Bugfixing Play, Pause, Next and Previous Track functions

- Add support for Zone2 and Zone3
- Treat NR1604 as AVR-X device
- Bugfixing

- Add support for favourite channels
- Add option to display all input functions also those marked as deleted
- Treat Marantz SR5008 as Denon AVR-X device
- Add Marantz NETWORK audio source

- Add Marantz SSDP discovery
- Detect error string in AppCommand.xml body
- Fixed potential AttributeError when checking for deleted sources
- Added support of Marantz receivers based on M-RC610
- [fixed] use on/off states for mute settings
- [added] New properties for netaudio_func_list and playing_func_list
